info.name: Donation API
info.description: API collection for Donation System with WebSocket support

request.description: Trigger donation notification with image/video. Auto-detects media type from URL (image/video/YouTube). Supports both 'imageUrl' (legacy) and 'mediaUrl'. Amount is integer (1000 = 10 seconds display time). Message max 160 characters. Automatically shows overlay, sets media, and displays donation message in realtime.
Set countdown timer target. Format: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ss or YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss. Automatically shows countdown in realtime.
